title: Soon-Shiong to buy LA Times from Tronc
text:
Soon-Shiong to buy LA Times from Tronc Wednesday, February 07, 2018 - 00:49 
Tronc Inc said on Wednesday it would sell the Los Angeles Times, the San Diego Union-Tribune and some other newspapers to billionaire investor Patrick Soon-Shiong for $500 million. Nathan Frandino reports.
